text: Aphids on soybean: Monitor early morning. Spray insecticidal soap or neem oil for small infestations. For larger infestations consider systemic insecticides as per local guidelines. Encourage ladybugs and lacewings.
सोयाबीन में एफिड्स: शुरुआती अवस्था में नीम का तेल या साबुन का घोल छिड़के। बड़े संक्रमण पर स्थानीय कृषि वैज्ञानिक से परामर्श करके कीटनाशक का उपयोग करें।
Fertilizer guidance for paddy: Apply basal dose of NPK as recommended by soil test. Split nitrogen application into multiple doses to improve uptake and reduce losses.
Government scheme: PM Kisan provides small direct income support to eligible farmers. Check local agriculture office for registration details and subsidy schedules.
